subject: Re: Order #SSN1672 confirmed
description_text:
Hi SIMSONN,

I ordered the Plus X pedals in June and my throttle damper is making really
annoying squeaky noises when you compress it.

Is there anything I can do to fix this or can you send a replacement ?

Thanks
Lindell

conversations.body_text: Hi Lindell Harry,    Please provide a video showing the effect of pressing the accelerator pedal, and we will help you determine if there is a problem.

Thanks for rhe quick reply

https://youtube.com/shorts/4OwYnogXO6M?si=zY7eWyoUw5NhKCkA

On Wed, 30 Jul 2025, 11:44 am service@simsonn.com,

Hi Lindell Harry,     Please use an M6 hex wrench to loosen and remove the throttle damper rod. Check whether the two screws on the rod’s middle joint are loose and tighten them if necessary. Then, make sure the black tape between the joint and the screw post is still in place, as it helps reduce vibration and eliminate noise.
